headline: Will Leidos (LDOS) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?
summary: Leidos (LDOS) has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report.

raw.headline: Will Leidos (LDOS) Beat Estimates Again in Its Next Earnings Report?

headline: Leidos to launch next phase of DODNet transformation through accelerated migration of defense agencies
summary: Leidos (NYSE: LDOS) is accelerating the migration of eight additional Defense Agencies and Field Activities to DODNet, the Defense Information Systems Agency's (DISA) modern network environment. Building on the successful transition of five agencies this year, this effort will help DISA enhance user experience and advance Zero Trust compliance while bolstering mission readiness.

headline: Leidos Deepens AI Governance Role In US Defense And Intelligence Systems
summary: Leidos Holdings (NYSE:LDOS) has partnered with Trustible to automate AI governance workflows for U.S. government customers, compressing reviews from weeks to hours. The company secured a major contract to modernize the Defense Information Systems Agency’s secure IT operations with AI driven tools and Zero Trust compliance. Leidos is also integrating RegScale’s automated risk management for the U.S. Air Force as part of its broader push into secure digital modernization. For you as an...

headline: 2 Industrials Stocks for Long-Term Investors and 1 Facing Headwinds
summary: Even if they go mostly unnoticed, industrial businesses are the backbone of our country. They are also bound to benefit from a friendlier regulatory environment with the Trump administration, and this excitement has led to a six-month gain of 23.6% for the sector - higher than the S&P 500’s 7.7% return.
